NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Oeno, I request urgent assistance in locating a native lifeform that has escaped the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>!
2
1
CYCAD: The quantum shard slipped from my sight when I disengaged my voyager stone by accident earlier.. When the shard returned, the lifeform that was resting on it was gone!
3 2
OENO: We must locate this missing lifeform before the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> begins; the Sanctuary is their only protection from the supernova if the project fails!
4
3
OENO: I have located and delivered the escaped lifeform back into the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> Cycad! Please watch over them with great care.
5
3
OENO: But Cycad, you should be able to travel using the quantum shard too, even as a voyager! If any more escapes occur, I implore you to take matters into your own hands.
6
5
CYCAD: But the surface of the planet is never completely dark enough to allow a conscious individual to travel to it using the quantum shard! I do not see how...
7
6
CYCAD: Oh, I see how I can travel outside now! A voyager lacks the ability to observe its surroundings on its own!
8
7
CYCAD: I only wish the quantum shard didn't require a cover of darkness to visit the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
SY EX1 3
SY EX3 7
SY EX4 8
